backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing AdSense-related requirements and the files implementing them.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files used for quick reference in build planning.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file defining AdSense client ID and optional ad slot IDs with defaults.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML that injects the AdSense script once based on Vite environment variables.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that provides theming and renders the HomePage with notification support.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSenseAd.ts: Reusable AdSense ad component handling initialization, fallback behavior, and duplicate prevention.
frontend/src/config/adsense.ts: Centralized module exposing environment-based AdSense client and slot IDs with helper checks.
frontend/src/features/compare/components: Currency conversion UI widget allowing amount input and multi-currency conversions using provided rates.
UI panel for selecting up to three currencies and comparing their rates against a base currency with validation for duplicates and minimum selection.
frontend/src/features/compare/lib/conver: Utility to convert an amount between two currencies using rates relative to a base currency with basic validation.
frontend/src/features/rates/api/exchange: API helpers to fetch latest exchange rates and available currencies from the Frankfurter service.
frontend/src/features/rates/api/historic: API helper to fetch and transform historical exchange rate data over a date range for a currency pair.
frontend/src/features/rates/components/B: Dropdown component for selecting a base currency with names resolved via metadata.
frontend/src/features/rates/components/D: Preset selector component for choosing predefined historical date ranges.
frontend/src/features/rates/components/H: SVG-based chart component that renders historical rate data with scales, axes, line, and area fill.
Panel wrapping presets, refresh controls, loading/error states, and the historical rates chart for a currency pair.
frontend/src/features/rates/components/R: Searchable, sortable table displaying exchange rates with error/loading handling and optional historical view triggers.
Toolbar showing last-updated timestamp and a refresh button for reloading exchange rates.
frontend/src/features/rates/currencyMeta: Defines a map of currency codes to display names and provides a helper to resolve names.
frontend/src/features/rates/hooks/useHis: React Query hook that fetches historical exchange rates based on a date range preset.
frontend/src/features/rates/hooks/useLiv: React Query hook for polling live exchange rates with a 60â€‘second refresh interval.
frontend/src/features/rates/lib/dateRang: Utilities for computing ISO date ranges and labels for historical rate presets.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating backend-specific hooks are unused for this app.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light and dark theme color variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page UI combining live rates, controls, ads, and optional historical rate panels.
frontend/src/types/adsense.d.ts: Type declaration adding the adsbygoogle array to the Window interface.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, layout, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architectural notes on domain and AdSense setup, and a list of implemented features for the CurrencyPal app. Contains no code but tracks versions, requirements, and current project state.
